definition: according to/to act in accordance with/to depend on/to seize/to occupy

sentences.english: The wildcat intruded into Chenggong's territory and was caught and killed by her.
sentences.chinese: 据悉，该野猫私闯了“成功”的领地，被抓捕并咬死。

sentences.english: Jordan and Prieto are reported to have met last summer.
sentences.chinese: 据悉，二人去年夏天相识。

sentences.english: The intelligence report is understood to have been issued to European navies.
sentences.chinese: 据悉，这份情报报告已经被分发到欧洲各国海军。

sentences.english: The man surnamed Huo operated a private studio in Quanjiao county.
sentences.chinese: 据悉，男子姓霍，在全椒县经营一家私人工作室。

sentences.english: The riot was said that it was organized by illegal organizations of outside border.
sentences.chinese: 这次暴乱据悉是由境外非法组织策划的。

sentences.english: Consuming too much sodium cyclamate can harm the liver.
sentences.chinese: 据悉，甜蜜素食用过多会伤肝。

sentences.english: These will now be dealt with by sea-borne systems.
sentences.chinese: 据悉正被处理成由舰载系统发射的防御导弹系统。

sentences.english: It's believed that the riot was plotted by illegal organizations abroad.
sentences.chinese: 这次暴乱据悉是由境外非法组织策划的。

sentences.english: The restaurant held a wedding reception earlier in the night.
sentences.chinese: 据悉，头天晚上这个餐馆举办了一场结婚庆典。

sentences.english: He weighs just 12 kilograms, the same as a three-year-old.
sentences.chinese: 据悉，黄开全体重仅为12公斤，和三岁幼童差不多。

sentences.english: It is reported that Suleiman had promised to Israel for its "sweeping Sinai mountains."
sentences.chinese: 据悉，苏莱曼曾向以色列许诺要为其“清扫西奈山”。

sentences.english: It is reported that Japan Jinxing Huan will focus on nuclear and other issues.
sentences.chinese: 据悉，金星焕将与日方重点讨论朝核等问题。

sentences.english: It is reported that perpetrators are Qiandongnan Sansui County, called the dragon years strong.
sentences.chinese: 据悉，行凶者是黔东南州三穗县人，叫龙久烈。

sentences.english: Liang was the highest-ranking official to recently declare the country's need for carriers.
sentences.chinese: 据悉，梁是近来正式表态中国需要航母的最高官员。

sentences.english: The attack marked the 1st time that a ship of the Nautica's size had been targeted by pirates.
sentences.chinese: 据悉，这一级别的客轮成为海盗袭击目标尚属首次。

sentences.english: It is learnt that the pilot Zuotang practise in our province will also start.
sentences.chinese: 据悉，坐堂行医试点也将在我省启动。

definition: it is said/allegedly/according to reports/or so they say
according to a report/It is reported that...
the other day/a few days ago
in the past few days/recently/in the last few days
to express/to show/to say/to state/to indicate/to mean
to learn of sth/to find out/to get news
